boardgame.name: Noblemen
boardgame.description: In the mid-sixteenth century England, Queen Elizabeth I rules without an heir. This leaves room for some maneuvering. Powers throughout, including you, believe that a family with great presence, wealth, and nobility might find itself in the right place at the right time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Noblemen, you are members of the British aristocracy. You will try to achieve influence and prestige for your family. You will grow your family's estate, earn the queen's favor, bear witness to scandalous behavior, gain influence with the church, bribe royalty, and leverage your political weight during masquerade balls, all in an effort to ensure your family's rightful place in history. After three decades, the player with the most victory points will be declared the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is a game of several races all going on at the same time. Players race the clock; you will never know exactly how many turns are remaining before the scoring round. Players will race each other _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; to build cheaper buildings, to be the first to build a folly, to have more prestige and therefore gain a higher noble title, and more. On your turn you can play one scandal card (if you choose) in addition to taking one action from the following possibilities:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Grow Estate _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Play lands from behind your screen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Build Structure _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Buy and play a building on a meadow _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Bribe Royalty _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Buy bribe tickets you can redeem later_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Collect Taxes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Get money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Acquire Lands _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Get more land from the bag of random lands_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Donate to the Church _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Redeem lands for victory points_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Leisure Time _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Get one victory point_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On most of your turns, you will build your estate by playing land tiles or building structures. There are three commodities to concentrate on: lands, wealth, and prestige. Each commodity will help on your path to victory. It is for you to decide each turn which is the most needed for you to win the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 342 - Noblemen, Cirplexed, Guildhall, and a bit on Tzolkin
The Spiel #175 - In Praise of Folly

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Noblemen German first edition Publisher: Pegasus Spiele
new, in shrink

Tasty Minstrel Games (TTT2002) In the mid-sixteenth century England Queen Elizabeth I rules without an heir. This leaves room for some maneuvering. Powers throughout, including you, believe that a family with great presence, wealth, and nobility might find itself in the right place at the right time. In Noblemen, you are members of the British aristocracy. You will try to achieve influence and prestige for your family. You will grow your family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s estate, earn the queen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s favor, bear witness to scandalous behavior, gain influence with the church, bribe royalty, and leverage your political weight during masquerade balls; all in an effort to ensure your family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s rightful place in history. After three decades, the player with the most victory points will be declared the winner.
Reserved for Jonathan Brown.

Only played twice. All components in excellent condition. Box itself has slight dent on one edge that apparently happened when being originally shipped to me from TMG. Please let me know if you want me to send you pictures.
Punched but unplayed. Manual did get wet, but has dried out pretty well. Reserved for Ryan S.
In Shrink! (TMG edition) SOLD for $40 to Kristina Jones in my GL Auction
Already sold at auction to Don S. Shipping cost with other title
For Beaker73
Played once, local pickup in portland
This is for flightsurg
English first edition Publisher: Tasty Minstrel Games

Sealed new condition. Buyer pays actual shipping from the 95051 zip code. I will work with you to minimize shipping costs and combine shipping wherever possible. I prefer USPS fixed rate priority boxes, which usually means $12.35 for a medium box. Please check out my other games for sale.
Played just once. Shipping is: including shipping insurance: 7 EUR to Germany,18 EUR to EU, 37 EUR to Europe, U.S. and Canada and 44 EUR worldwide

Played three times. Everything is in great condition. Buyer to pay actual USPS Priority Mail shipping costs. Check out my other items in the market and save by combining shipping! Live in the Western MA area? Pick it up from me for free!
reserved for Johnag68
Auction winnings for clearlysuper. Noblemen Bombay $21 + $5 = $26 SHIPPING TBD After receiving confirmation and shipping cost, please make payments to gquicho@gmail.com via Paypal.

The game: Pegasus Spiele (c) 2012. GERMAN edition - game rules and game material language dependent! All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
for pinhead only.
RESERVED FOR AUCTION WINNER THEOSPREY247 Out of shrink, but cardboard is unpunched. Never played obviously. Excellent condition. TMG edition.
Never played. Will ship USPS flat rate med or priority box.

Tasty Minstrel Games (TTT2002) In the mid-sixteenth century England Queen Elizabeth I rules without an heir. This leaves room for some maneuvering. Powers throughout, including you, believe that a family with great presence, wealth, and nobility might find itself in the right place at the right time. In Noblemen, you are members of the British aristocracy. You will try to achieve influence and prestige for your family. You will grow your family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s estate, earn the queen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s favor, bear witness to scandalous behavior, gain influence with the church, bribe royalty, and leverage your political weight during masquerade balls; all in an effort to ensure your family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s rightful place in history. After three decades, the player with the most victory points will be declared the winner.
Played once. Everything in as new condition. Box undamaged. UK postage £5 Combined postage £6 for up to 5kg

Tasty Minstrel Games (TTT2002) In the mid-sixteenth century England Queen Elizabeth I rules without an heir. This leaves room for some maneuvering. Powers throughout, including you, believe that a family with great presence, wealth, and nobility might find itself in the right place at the right time. In Noblemen, you are members of the British aristocracy. You will try to achieve influence and prestige for your family. You will grow your family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s estate, earn the queen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s favor, bear witness to scandalous behavior, gain influence with the church, bribe royalty, and leverage your political weight during masquerade balls; all in an effort to ensure your family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s rightful place in history. After three decades, the player with the most victory points will be declared the winner.

In Noblemen, you are members of the British aristocracy. You will try to achieve influence and prestige for your family. You will grow your family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s estate, earn the queen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s favor, bear witness to scandalous behavior, gain influence with the church, bribe royalty, and leverage your political weight during masquerade balls; all in an effort to ensure your family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s rightful place in history. After three decades, the player with the most victory points will be declared the winner.
